import React from 'react'; import CalendarSection from './CalendarSection'; export default function AppointManagement(props) { const { appointment, appointments, handleNewAppointChange, handleAppointSubmit, handleAppointDelete } = props; // JSX return (

{props.appointments.length} appointments scheduled for now.

{/*

Click on an appointment to view or edit details.

*/}




{/* Render appointments */}

Appointment List

{props.appointments.map((item, index) => (

Appointer: {item.name}

Brief Summary: {item.title}

Start Date&Time: {item.start.toLocaleString()}

End Date&Time: {item.end.toLocaleString()}

))}
); }
